name: register_domain
attributes: # [doc = " サイトドメインを登録します。"]
# [doc = " - `domain`: 許可する URL のドメイン (例: `\"example.com\"`)"]
# [doc = " 署名チェックは行いません。"]
body: let cfg = & mut ctx . accounts . site_config ;

name: log_access
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーの滞在秒数と NFT 保有量に応じてトークンを付与します。"]
# [doc = " - `url`: 実際にアクセスされたページの URL"]
body: require ! (url . contains (& cfg . domain) , SiteError :: InvalidDomain) ;
let nft_count = ctx . accounts . provider_hold . amount ;
let rec = & mut ctx . accounts . provider_reward ;
rec . total_duration = rec . total_duration . checked_add (duration_secs) . unwrap_or (rec . total_duration) ;
rec . total_awarded = rec . total_awarded . checked_add (to_award) . unwrap_or (rec . total_awarded) ;

fields.name: site_config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 設定用 PDA (事前に init_if_needed)"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = payer , seeds = [b"site_cfg"] , bump , space = 8 + (4 + 100))]

fields.name: provider
fields.attribute: # [doc = " サイト提供者アカウント（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: provider_hold
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 保有量参照用 TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = provider_hold . owner == * provider . key , constraint = provider_hold . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: provider_reward
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 累積報酬用 PDA"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"site_reward" , provider . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: site_config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 事前登録されたサイト設定"] # [account (seeds = [b"site_cfg"] , bump)]
